channel.title: CVE Feed for buymeacoffee -- Buy Me a Coffee – Button and Widget Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for buymeacoffee -- Buy Me a Coffee – Button and Widget Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-2082|2024-09-27T19:59:43.278Z -- buymeacoffee -- buy%20me%20a%20coffee%20%E2%80%93%20button%20and%20widget%20plugin
item.description: The "Buy Me a Coffee – Button and Widget Plugin" plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting in versions up to, and including, 3.6 due to insufficient sanitization and escaping on the 'text value set via the bmc_post_reception action. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level permissions, and above to inject arbitrary web scripts into pages that execute whenever a victim accesses a page with the injected scripts.
